name: Tangerine Clicker!
description:
This is Tangerine! Click him and you will get Tangerine Points!

Tangerine Points is a currency in this game, you can spend it in the shop! Click the circle in the bottom right of the screen to go to the shop.

Price:

1+ Click Power: $10

10+ Click Power: $100

100+ Click Power: $1,000

1,000+ Click Power: $10,000

10,000+ Click Power: $100,000

100,000+ Click Power: $1,000,000

1,000,000+ Click Power: $10,000,000

If your wondering what Click Power is its how much Tangerine Points you get in 1 click!

Tap! Tap! Tap! And be the richest person in the game!

Comment below how much Tangerine Points you have.

Bye Bye!
